dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4361 IH: Smarter Pretrial Detention for Drug Charges Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Trone (for himself, Ms. Mace, Mr. Mfume, Ms. Scanlon, and Ms. Norton) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To give Federal courts additional discretion to determine whether pretrial detention is appropriate for defendants charged with nonviolent drug offenses in Federal criminal cases.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Smarter Pretrial Detention for Drug Charges Act of 2023.

section.header: Release conditions and detention in Federal criminal cases
section.text: Section 3142 of title 18, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking (42 U.S.C. 14135a) each place it appears and inserting (34 U.S.C. 40702); and

subparagraph.text: by redesignating subparagraphs (B), (C), (D), and (E) as subparagraphs (A), (B), (C), and (D), respectively.
